0: The room comes with 2 bottles of water on the counter
There were six of us and they provided us with 3 mini gazebos each of which could fit two lounge chairs

We were taken to our room which was a nice room although the room and grounds had seen better days however when we opened the drapes we discovered we had a view of a parking lot building in the midst of heavy renovation
The room was set up nicely but a bit of privacy would have been nice if traveling with a family
The room did come out a bit more expensive than previously thought with the exchange rate and tax and daily resort service charge
This was disappointing for us as being on our honeymoon we envisioned relaxing out on the balcony with a cold beer
Room 306 view of another building and a parking lot
I showed pics to the front desk and was given a larger room and was told the room would be made available for a few weeks
The bed was not comfortable at all people were right outside of the room smoking pool was nice and the beach access was not what I had imagined
We look at the room cleaning as a small hiccup and no big deal
1: Hands down the best service and largest rooms in Miami
Rooms were clean and bright had tv iron fridge ect
Roof deck and garage parking awesome extras as was boutique shop in lobby
In the evening I eat drank on the restaurant terrace with the lagoon and gardens all lit up
My room was decorated in a coastal style with lots of light blue sky and Florida green scape embedded in the tile patterns
The room was spacious with a large bathroom and room service was pretty quick and delicious
I stayed couple days for business in savoy hotel the room was clean and very good location
Our rooms had the lovely floral walls
The rooms are amazing huge and clean we enjoyed the drinks next to the pool and then we went to the beach when we got the best hospitality from Kevin Wilky and Christian
Room was beautifully decorated more like a home than a hotel room
